column1:
Read the task next 
 to your controller. 
 Press START to begin the task. 
 
 Press STOP to finish the task.  
 Walk on the appearing 
 red area to continue.

Press START when you are ready to beginn the task  \n The measurement will start immediately. Now select the method which seems to be most adequate for this task. Grab the target object and place it on the target area. Press STOP to finish the task  \n The measurements will be stopped. Walk on to the appearing red area to continue with the next task.
